mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.id_number AS "idNumber", a.pass_date AS "passDate", a.formal_date AS "formalDate", a.introducer AS "introducer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_org_id AS "createOrgId", a.create_id_no AS "createIdNo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_org_id AS "updateOrgId", a.update_id_no AS "updateIdNo", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.personnel_name AS "personnelName"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO personnel_party_member( id, id_number, pass_date, formal_date, introducer, create_by, create_org_id, create_id_no, create_date, update_by, update_org_id, update_id_no, update_date, del_flag, personnel_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{idNumber}, #{passDate}, #{formalDate}, #{introducer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createBy.office.id}, #{createIdNo}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateBy.office.id}, #{updateIdNo}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{personnelName} )
